OOC: his robot has  no resemblence. Except that one side of his head in robot 
mode relects megatron and the other side reflects Galvatron.

 Galvatron yelled our his voice high and booming. "Cyngar you have always 
been a fool! Finally the predacons the true predacons shall be reunited under 
one banner. Join us or be destroyed. Though that fate was always where your 
treachery intended for you to go. He spread out his wings his mund shooting 
to Megatron. "Shall we spite him now and end the threat?"

OOC:rqaux email me and tell me if u wanna control the robot mode for the 
first period of time im confused on what our plans are.

--part1_12a.177513ce.2ab8bec8_boundary
